wikipedia_page.main: Christopher 'Chris' Patrick Chung, also credited as Christopher Young, is an Australian actor and singer of Chinese and Irish descent, best known for playing Archie Wong in Waterloo Road. He grew up in Australia, studied in New York and now works in London.

response: Christopher Chung Shu-kun, SBS, JP (; born 31 March 1957, commonly known as "Tree Gun") was elected to the Legislative Council of Hong Kong in 2012, representing the Hong Kong Island constituency. He is also former chairman of Eastern District Council, and a former councillor from 1991 to 2015, representing the Yue Wan constituency. He is a veteran member of the Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong, the flagship pro-Beijing party in Hong Kong.Live coverage: Pan-democrats hold on to veto power in LegcoHe was awarded the Silver Bauhinia Star by the Hong Kong SAR Government in 2017.
